name: Get Up
content: You're so close to the wall
Take you away make you my home
带你远走高飞让你成为我的家
I don't care where we are
我不在乎我们身在何处
As long as you give it your all
因为你封锁了所有的爱
因为这种感觉根本就不够
All I want is all of you
And all in me our love is you
在我心中我们的爱就是你
So you better get up now ohh
因为你封锁了你所有的爱
All I all I want is all of you
我想要的全部就是你的全部
I know we're kind of lost
But at least I'm here with you
唯一的出路就是扶摇直上
Hey as long as I give you my all
因为你封锁了所有的爱
因为这种感觉根本就不够
All I want is all of you
And all in me our love is you
在我心中我们的爱就是你
So you better get up ohh
因为你封锁了所有的爱
All I all I want is all of you
我想要的全部就是你的全部
